localization.EKFTwoD¶

class localization.EKFTwoD(x_dim=1, u_dim=0, z_dim=1)¶

Bases: localization.ExtendedKalmanFilter

Simple Cartesian plane EKF: x and y position, body frame velocity, heading, angular velocity. Measures distance and bearing to a fixed landmark. Here as an example

__init__(x_dim=1, u_dim=0, z_dim=1)¶

Construct the Kalman Filter. Can either construct by specifying each matrix in the model or by specifying the length of the state vector
